page.title: 19A SCHOOL DAY IN THE 1920,s
page.content: EDUCATION LOCAL HISTORY 65 years ago the children at Bentworth school started at 9:00 am,they went home at 12:00 pm for lunch & came back at 1:00 pm.They went home at 3:45 pm, there was a bell in the roof that rang at these times.The boys playground was separate from the girls playground.Our School field in Mrs Knight,s time was owned by Mr Talbot & the children were not allowed on it.They washed from a bucket just containing water.They went to the loo in a bucket with a wooden seat over it.Mrs Knight always went home because she lived over the road where Mrs Gilmor lives now.They had no sports at school but they had a Sunday School sports day.They joined in with the harvest in school time bringing in the corn. by Andrew & Jonathan.
